Add_Weighted.title: add weighted
Add_Weighted.tooltip: Calculate the weighted sum of two Tensors.

src1.title: src1
src1.tooltip: Tensor with an arbitrary shape, equal to shape of src2

src2.title: src2
src2.tooltip: Tensor with an arbitrary shape, equal to shape of src1.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Weighted Tensor with shape equal to src1 and src2 shapes.

Adjust_Brightness.title: adjust brightness
Adjust_Brightness.tooltip: Adjust the brightness of an image tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: Brightness adjust factor per element in the batch. It's recommended to bound the factor by [0, 1]

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted tensor in the shape of (*,H,W)

Adjust_Contrast.title: adjust contrast
Adjust_Contrast.tooltip: Adjust the brightness of an image tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: Contrast adjust factor per element in the batch. It's recommended to bound the factor by [0, 1]

clip_output.title: clip_output
clip_output.tooltip: whether to clip the output image with range of [0, 1].

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,H,W)

Adjust_Contrast_With_Mean_subtraction.title: adjust contrast with mean subtraction
Adjust_Contrast_With_Mean_subtraction.tooltip: Adjust the contrast of an image tensor by subtracting the mean over channels.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: Contrast adjust factor per element in the batch. Itâ€™s recommended to bound the factor by [0, 1]

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,H,W)

Adjust_Gamma.title: adjust gamma
Adjust_Gamma.tooltip: Perform gamma correction on an image.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

gamma.title: gamma
gamma.tooltip: Non negative real number, same as ygammay in the equation. gamma larger than 1 make the shadows darker, while gamma smaller than 1 make dark regions lighter.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,H,W)

Adjust_Hue.title: adjust hue
Adjust_Hue.tooltip: Perform gamma correction on an image.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,3,H,W)

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: How much to shift the hue channel.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,3,H,W)

Adjust_Saturation.title: adjust saturation
Adjust_Saturation.tooltip: Adjust color saturation of an image.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,3,H,W)

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: How much to adjust the saturation. 0 will give a black and white image, 1 will give the original image while 2 will enhance the saturation by a factor of 2.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,3,H,W)

Adjust_Sigmoid.title: adjust sigmoid
Adjust_Sigmoid.tooltip: Adjust sigmoid correction on the input image tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

inv.title: inv
inv.tooltip: If is set to True the function will return the inverse sigmoid correction.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,H,W)

Adjust_Log.title: adjust log
Adjust_Log.tooltip: Adjust log correction on the input image tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Image to be adjusted in the shape of (*,H,W)

inv.title: inv
inv.tooltip: If is set to True the function will return the inverse logarithmic correction.

clip_output.title: clip_output
clip_output.tooltip: Whether to clip the output image with range of [0, 1].

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted image in the shape of (*,H,W)

Invert.title: invert
Invert.tooltip: Invert the values of an input image tensor by its maximum value.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: The input tensor to invert with an arbitatry shape.

max_val.title: max_val
max_val.tooltip: The expected maximum value in the input tensor.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Adjusted tensor in the same shape of input

Posterize.title: posterize
Posterize.tooltip: Reduce the number of bits for each color channel.

bits.title: bits
bits.tooltip: number of high bits. Must be in range [0, 8].

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Image with reduced color channels with shape(*,C,H,W)

Sharpness.title: sharpness
Sharpness.tooltip: Apply sharpness to the input tensor.

factor.title: factor
factor.tooltip: factor of sharpness strength. Must be above 0.

outputImage.title: image
outputImage.tooltip: Sharpened image or images with shape(*,C,H,W)

Solarize.title: solarize
Solarize.tooltip: For each pixel in the image less than threshold,we add 'addition' amount to it and then clip the pixel value to be between 0 and 1.0.
